casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reche SMITH. No. 360A02. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 27, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mitchell D. Norton, District Attorney, for State of NC. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Reche Smith.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of May 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 12th day of July 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of May 2004."
